title: Nandu Kuppuswamy, Senior Finance Executive joins as 3Lines Partner - PRNewswire

description: /PRNewswire/ -- Nandu Kuppuswamy, CFA, the former Head of Investor Relations at Sandstone Capital, >$1B AUM hedge fund, has joined 3Lines as a partner and...
